channel.title: phylogeny on FRB-CESAB
channel.description: Recent content in phylogeny on FRB-CESAB

item.title: WOODIV Database
item.author: nicolas.casajus@fondationbiodiversite.fr (FRB-CESAB)
item.description: Provides occurrences, four functional traits (plant height, seed mass, wood density, and specific leaf area), and sequences from three DNA-regions (rbcL, matK, and trnH-psbA), together with modelled occurrences and a phylogeny for all 210 Euro-Mediterranean tree species (10 Ã— 10 km grid).
